english.segment1: Ever living God. Maker of all the earth. Ever lasting King. Our eternal praise belongs to You. All of the honour. All of the glory to You
english.segment2: You are. Wonderful, marvellous, forever. Beautiful, Prince of Peace, Faithful One, forever
english.segment3: Take the place of all honour. Take the place above all thrones. Take the place of all power. You are the One. Glorious
